title: "Estimating Causal Effects"
output: html-notebook
---

```{r, message=FALSE}
# import libraries
library(WeightIt)
library(lmtest)
library(sandwich)
# import dataset
los_data <- read.csv("los_data.csv")

# create IPTW weights
iptw_ef2 <- weightit(
  formula = low_ef ~ age + cholesterol + heart_attack, #propensity model
  data = los_data, #dataset
  estimand = "ATT", #effect
  method = "ps", #use IPTW
)
```
# Checkpoint 1
```{r}
# Create outcome model
outcome_mod <- glm(
  #outcome model
  hospital_los ~ low_ef + age + cholesterol + heart_attack, 
  #dataset
  data = los_data,
  #IPTW weights 
  weights = iptw_ef2$weights)
```
# Checkpoint 2
```{r}
# Get coefficients with robust standard errors
att_robust <- coeftest(
  outcome_mod, #weighted outcome model
  vcov. = vcovHC #robust standard errors
)
```
# Checkpoint 3
```{r}
# View the estimated coefficients
print(att_robust)
```
